document_data.name: ''REgarding Strange in These Parts''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Regarding Strange Riders in These Parts''''' was a document written by [[Damon Briska]], regarding the overreach of the [[Hellriders]] of [[Elturgard]].

{{Quote|Don't be fooled by shining armour or handsome mounts - I never betn the knee to any Elturgard, and I never asked any metalled jester to come peering over my garden fence.|''Excerpt from Regarding Strange Riders''.}}
document_data.Description: Multiple copies of the note were posted across numerous settlements in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Content: The notice was a call to action for citizens of the Heartlands. Briska shared their concern for the growing presence of Elturian riders, patrolling across the borders of [[Elturgard]]. They shared their family heritage and how they would not pay fealty to any foreign city.
document_data.History: Damon Briska posted one of these notices in the village of [[Moonhaven]], found near the local [[Shattered Sanctum|church of Selûne]].
